Lack of money is killing all my efforts to save countless lives and thanks if you buy my books (Amazon and Barnes and Noble and etc.). And there are over 900 of my answers on Quora for free. We have a sun that delivers about 5000 times more energy upon the earth every day, than we need or can consume. Anything that can harvest that energy more efficiently than the present rate of 15 - 25% (say 50% efficiency) will be highly desirable. But it must be ‘clean’ and environmentally friendly.
